title: Fri Post Show (04-01-22)
itunes:title: Fri Post Show (04-01-22)
description:
Bobby starts by getting to voicemails we didn’t get to during the radio show. Bobby has an idea for Lunchbox to make money next week with his doll. Jason Aldean gives his thoughts on Eric Church cancelling his show to go to the Final Four.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
